alert.note: Alert for Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:01PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Uintah County through 330 PM MDT... At 259 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bonanza, 18 miles southwest of Dinosaur, or 36 miles southeast of Vernal, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Uintah County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
